Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Validation

Interface IShotValidator

All Known Implementing Classes:
ShotValidator
public interface IShotValidator
Interface defining the contract for shot validation in the Battleship game. Provides methods to validate shots by checking coordinate validity and ensuring the target has not been previously shot.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isNotAlreadyShot(IBoard board, Coordinate coordinate)
    Checks if the coordinate has not been shot at before.
    boolean
    isValidCoordinate(IBoard board, Coordinate coordinate)
    Checks if the coordinate is valid within the board boundaries.
    boolean
    validate(IBoard board, Coordinate coordinate)
    Validates whether a shot at the specified coordinate is legal.

  • Method Details

    • validate

      boolean validate(IBoard board, Coordinate coordinate)
      Validates whether a shot at the specified coordinate is legal. Checks that the coordinate is valid and has not been shot before.
      Parameters:
      board - the game board
      coordinate - the coordinate to validate
      Returns:
      true if the shot is valid, false otherwise

    • isValidCoordinate

      boolean isValidCoordinate(IBoard board, Coordinate coordinate)
      Checks if the coordinate is valid within the board boundaries.
      Parameters:
      board - the game board
      coordinate - the coordinate to check
      Returns:
      true if the coordinate is valid, false otherwise

    • isNotAlreadyShot

      boolean isNotAlreadyShot(IBoard board, Coordinate coordinate)
      Checks if the coordinate has not been shot at before. Ensures the cell is neither hit nor marked as a miss.
      Parameters:
      board - the game board
      coordinate - the coordinate to check
      Returns:
      true if the coordinate has not been shot, false otherwise
